New York City faces significant challenges this week, including messy travel conditions due to snow, rising violence with multiple stabbings in Times Square, and a controversial sale of rent-stabilized apartments, while the city also grapples with a new affordability agenda and stricter SNAP work rules.

### Risks & Alerts

- NYC weather forecast predicts messy travel conditions due to snow on Sunday. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Several people injured in a fire at a tire repair shop in Queens.
